p: As showed in Fig 1A, the CC 50 of rhein in A549 cells was 64.59 μg/mL (Y = -0.1889 LnX + 1.2137, R 2 = 0.9377). At the concentration of 10 μg/mL, rhein did not show significant cytotoxicity and we chose this concentration (10 μg/mL) as the test concentration in the following pharmacological experiments.
